works perfectly. i'm attempting to switch to ascent from mangos so i can take it public... blagh too many differences... and i know the .tele command not being present alone is gonna make me loose a couple gms... maybe i'll modify one of those telenpcs i see on ascentemu and just script it as a gm command. meh... thanks for the repack! though i'm look'n around for something newer, like 2988 or closer.
